He laid <S%G2007><s%> his hands <S%G5495><s%> on them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> departed <S%G4198><s%> from there. <S%G1564><s%>

<S%G5091><s%> 'Honor your <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> mother. <S%G3384><s%>' And, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G25><s%> 'You shall love your <S%G4675><s%> neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> yourself. <S%G4572><s%>'"
